testsuite.name: Scenario: A Broadcast command recalls a prior Broadcast

testcase.classname: Scenario: A Broadcast command recalls a prior Broadcast

testcase.name: And an initialised environment
testcase.classname: Scenario: A Broadcast command recalls a prior Broadcast

testcase.name: And the system is bootstrapped
testcase.classname: Scenario: A Broadcast command recalls a prior Broadcast

testcase.name: Given a prior Broadcast "This is an OLD Broadcast!" with id "12344" was issued
testcase.classname: Scenario: A Broadcast command recalls a prior Broadcast

testcase.name: And a new Broadcast "This is an OLD Broadcast!" with id "12344" is available

testcase.name: When I enter "sdk broadcast"
testcase.classname: Scenario: A Broadcast command recalls a prior Broadcast

testcase.name: Then I see "This is an OLD Broadcast!"
testcase.classname: Scenario: A Broadcast command recalls a prior Broadcast
